snippet: The Georgia Institute of Technology will offer a master’s degree in computer science that can be earned entirely through so-called massive open online courses, or MOOCs.
abstract: Georgia Institute of Technology, along with AT&T and Udacity, plans to offer master's degree in computer science that can be earned entirely through so-called massive open online courses, or MOOCs.
lead_paragraph: The Georgia Institute of Technology will offer a master’s degree in computer science that can be earned entirely through so-called massive open online courses, or MOOCs.

headline.main: Georgia Tech Will Offer a Master’s Degree Online
headline.print_headline: Georgia Tech Will Offer a Master’s Degree Online
